commands: execute as @s[tag=satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false
execute as @s[tag=!satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=2}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.mask 0
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=3..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.mask

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=1}] run tag @s add energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run tag @s remove energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand=3}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=1}] run tag @s add hand.uni.beam
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=2..}] run tag @s remove hand.uni.beam
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.or.energy.beam=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.or.energy.beam
execute as @s run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.addon.skill.point.see 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.skill.point.see=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.addon.skill.point.see

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.flight.set
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=6..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=9..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.set
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.set
execute as @s[scores={satsu.prev.iron.man.armor=0..13}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.prev.iron.man.armor 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=0..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.prev.iron.man.armor 1

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night=1}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night matches 1.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night=1}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night matches 1.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.stealh.night 1

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=0..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed.choose=6..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed.choose 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=3..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3

execute as @e[tag=!striker.ground.drill,distance=..8] run effect give @s slowness 1 2 true

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=0..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed.choose=6..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed.choose 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=3..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3

execute as @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:sweep_attack ^ ^ ^1 0.1 0.1 0.1 0 1 normal

first_tick_commands: execute as @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:sweep_attack ^ ^ ^1 0.1 0.1 0.1 0 1 normal
execute anchored eyes run function grave.core:pick_entity/start_ray
commands: execute anchored feet rotated ~ 0 if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tp @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] ^ ^0.4 ^1.2
execute if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tag @s add grave.pick.grabbing
execute unless entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run scoreboard players add @s grave.pick.timer 1
execute anchored feet rotated ~ 0 if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tp @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] ^ ^0.4 ^1.2
execute if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tag @s add grave.pick.grabbing
execute unless entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run scoreboard players add @s grave.pick.timer 1

first_tick_commands: execute as @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] at @s run scoreboard players set @s grave.pick.throw 1
execute anchored eyes run function grave.core:pick_entity/start_ray
commands: execute anchored feet rotated ~ 0 if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tp @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] ^ ^0.4 ^1.2
execute if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tag @s add grave.pick.grabbing
execute unless entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run scoreboard players add @s grave.pick.timer 1

last_tick_commands: execute as @e[tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=1..1.3] run damage @s 45 minecraft:player_attack by @p

commands: execute as @e[tag=!mark.1873.clap_smoke_hands,distance=0..8] run effect give @s minecraft:wither 5 2 true
execute at @s as @e run effect give @e[tag=!superior.shockwave,distance=..5] minecraft:slowness 1 255 true
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.arms.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.arms.set

first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 0

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=0..1}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=1..3}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.break=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.break
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.break matches 0.. run title @s actionbar {"translate":"satsu.iron.man.addon.break.off","color":"blue"}}

first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand 1
commands: execute as @e[type=palladium:custom_projectile,sort=nearest] unless score @s grave.ID matches 0.. run scoreboard players operation @s grave.ID = @p grave.ID

last_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.unlocking.set.block=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.addon.unlocking.set.block

commands: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] run tag @s add sentinel.false.nearest
execute unless entity @e[tag=sentinel,distance=0..3] run tag @s remove sentinel.false.nearest

first_tick_commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded
execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded 1
execute as @s run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ark.skin
execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded.max.energy 1
commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ark.skin.choose matches 0.. as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ark.skin 1

first_tick_commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded.max.energy 2
commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ark.skin.choose matches 0.. as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ark.skin 2
